text.p: Koffijhuis Concordia. Uithoofde van BESLOTEN PARTIJ is bovengenoemd Koffijhuis Woensdag 3 April e. k. van af 2 Ure des Namiddags voor het Publiek GESLOTEN. C. T.REBBES. (7911) Buitensingel voor de Raambarrière XX 594. TinifllH e ilo MONTPELLIERHOUSE, London, Perfumers t» F lil lil- (* l . Majesty the Queen and DELCROIX. & CO., Royal Perfumers, Newbondstreet London, beg to inform the Nobility and Gentry of the Netherlands, that all their fashionabele Perfumes are sold at the London prices without any augmentation for duty and other expences, by the Verkoophuis. VICTORIA bouquet, PRÏNCE ALBERT and d'ORSAY bouquets, bouquets de ROSE, RONDELETIA, Price's COLDCREAM for chappe . hands and face; Delcroix's KALYDOR for the complexion; LIPSAEVE, Golden Oil of Macassar, Bearsgrease, old brown and white Windsor Soap, Marking Ink, etc.
